short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A high-performance, stable and necessary bot for the Bitefight Game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was created especially for all Bitefight players. Smarter, more stable and with more functions.
This extension is part of a series of 3 extensions: Silver, Gold and Master Auto Adventure where the Silver version is the simplest and cheapest.

Functionalities of the extension:

⭐️UNLIMITED NUMBER OF VAMPIRES/WEREWOLFS (FOR ONE LOBBY ACCOUNT)⭐️

⭐️STORY⭐️
*Auto complete the story in the most efficient way
*Prioritization of decisions (Whitelist and Blacklist)
*Default lists for decisions based on objectives (Gold, Aspects, Health or Experience)
*Stay alive with health protection
*100% healing at the church

NEW: 
🚀Now the extension comes pre-trained with 500,000/500,000 story decisions made. So that even from lvl 1 the bot is already trained and can choose the best decisions.
🚀Newly created accounts have preset in Whitelist and Blacklist the best decisions for GOLD + EXP according to the tests we performed.

⭐️GROTTO⭐️
*Target (set fixed number of demon hunts)
*Stay alive with health protection on grotto mode

⭐️MAN HUNT⭐️
*Target (set fixed number of man hunts)
*Continuous attack(UNLIMITED)

⭐️HOUSE OF PAIN⭐️
*Continuous attack
*Preview current items

⭐️PVP⭐️
*PvP Target (attack all, stonger or players from blacklist)
*Players Whitelist & Blacklist
*Continuous attack
*Preview current items	

⭐️EQUIPMENT⭐️
*Equipment Panel (See all items in one panel)

⭐️POTIONS(NEW)⭐️
*Use automatically Energy Potion, Soup Of Life, Medium Healing Potion & Blood Potion
*Potion logs panel

🚀To automatically purchase potions, you must choose the Gold or Master version of the bot.🚀

⭐️SPEND GOLD⭐️
*Automatically spend gold for skill
*Automatically donate gold to the clan

⭐️SHORTCUTS AND WIDGETS⭐️
*Panel with game shortcuts	
*Widget with game shortcuts	
*Widget with active orbs
*Shortcut for gold donation (Clan page)	
*Show all items(Profile page)

⭐️OTHERS⭐️
*Activity log
*Automatic enrollment in the war between clans
*Smarter area for orbs
*Fixed infobar when scrolling
*Advanced panel for notes with an unlimited number of characters (saved locally)

Other updates will follow!🚀

See more here: https://bitefight-bot.pages.dev/

2.99EUR Monthly subscription*.
Secure recurring payment with Stripe!

*the license is paid for an email address and must be the same as the one used for the Bitefight Lobby. If you pay for another email address, this bot will not work!

LIMITED: Now if you have more than one lobby account, after paying the license you can write to me at the email address masterofbitefight@gmail.com and I can add you a secondary address so that you can use the license on both lobby accounts.

Give up the old bot and make a major upgrade to Silver Auto Adventure now!
